name: workspace
body:
### welcome to boo workspace

This page contains my daily code samples which aren't specific to anything. Mainly, 
I prefer C, C++, JAVA and Perl languages, apart from these, there are typically some 
languages i use as well such as Common LISP, Python, Ruby and some Unix script languages.
Apart from my professional languages are not used for complex source codes, they are for
increasing to learn and be familiar curve.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

All source codes are public, you can use, change, copy or do anything whatever you want.
The copyrights are not reserved :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
